description:
Can you collect all 44 keys?
Sounds easy enough? try it and you will know!

You are a prisoner inside this huge maze, The objective is deceptively simple, explore the maze and collect all 44 keys to escape!

Features:
- Simple control, intuitive!
- Unique level design
- Addictive gameplay!
- Game Centre leaderboard


What people are saying:

nicksoper:
Couldnt put this down until I completed the game.

NiceGirl2233:
I am gonna be totally honest, this game is life. I have been on this game for the longest time, and its so fridgen fun, its challenging, and that is whats so great about this!

GreyEel:
Though simple, it is very challenging. I love how the sentences are there to make it more interesting.

Death Is Pie:
Even though its simple, this game captivates you with its snippets of text and addictive, difficult gameplay. Couldnt stop until I got all the keys :D
